mapper.insert: insert into t_resource ( resourcesId, resourcesPid, resourcesName, resourcesPath, resourcesDesc, resourcesType, indexValue, status, createTime )values ( #{resourcesid}, #{resourcespid}, #{resourcesname}, #{resourcespath}, #{resourcesdesc}, #{resourcestype}, #{indexvalue}, #{status}, #{createtime} )
mapper.update: update t_resource set resourcesId=#{resourcesid}, resourcesPid=#{resourcespid}, resourcesName=#{resourcesname}, resourcesPath=#{resourcespath}, resourcesDesc=#{resourcesdesc}, resourcesType=#{resourcestype}, indexValue=#{indexvalue}, status=#{status}, createTime=#{createtime} where resourcesId=#{resourcesid}
mapper.select: select resourcesId, resourcesPid, resourcesName, resourcesPath, resourcesDesc, resourcesType, indexValue, status, createTime from t_resource where resourcesId=#{resourcesid}
select resourcesId, resourcesPid, resourcesName, resourcesPath, resourcesDesc, resourcesType, indexValue, status, createTime from t_resource where resourcesId=#{resourcesid}

select DISTINCT(trs.resourcesId),trs.* from t_user tu join t_user_role tur on tu.userId=tur.userId join t_role tr on tr.roleId=tur.roleId join t_resource_role trr on tr.roleId=trr.roleId join t_resource trs on trs.resourcesId=trr.resourceId where tu.userId=#{userid} and tu.`status`=1 and tr.`status`=1 and trs.`status`=1 and trs.resourcesType<>3 order by trs.indexValue asc
